bill.title: Adds to existing law to provide for the Idaho Reimbursement Incentive Act and to provide for reimbursement to businesses for job creation from certain tax dollars.
bill.description: Adds to existing law to provide for the Idaho Reimbursement Incentive Act and to provide for reimbursement to businesses for job creation from certain tax dollars.
